formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Physical location of the jboss client script:
formElement.documentation: Provide the physical location of the jboss Command Line Interface script, i.e: 'jboss-cli.bat', '/path/to/jboss-cli.sh'. If omitted, script location from configuration will be used.

formElement.label: Hosts:
formElement.documentation: Provide the comma-separated list of host names.

formElement.label: Server groups:
formElement.documentation: Provide the comma-separated list of server group names. If "Hosts" parameter has been provided, procedure will search for server groups within that hosts list.

formElement.label: Servers:
formElement.documentation: Provide the comma-separated list of server names. If "Server groups" parameter has been provided, procedure will search for servers within that group.

formElement.label: Success criteria:
formElement.documentation: A desired terminal status of the deployment. The procedure will fail if criteria will not be reached.

formElement.label: Wait time:
formElement.documentation: Wait time for terminal status in seconds. If not provided, only one check will be performed. If 0, it will wait until criteria is met. Default 300.
